item.title: How shortener feature works
item.description: I have to make a system which can give us short version of URL and a way to track clicks. This gist is about how I solved the first part of problem: as short as possible URL. First things first. If we talk about system which handle URLs then we should have a table in database. Example table of URLs: My solution is to convert urls ID into base-n number system.
